page.title: 05Children's Hobbies
page.content:
Here are the hobbies of some of the children in our school:
Boy 1 Age 11 bird watching,tennis and football. Boy 2 Age 11 pool,swimming. Boy 3 Age 10 radio-controlled models. Boy 4 Age 10 stamp collecting. Boy 5 Age 10 most sports.
Girl 1 Age 9 horse riding,swimming. Girl 2 Age 11 horse riding. Girl 3 Age 11 football,swimming,stamp collecting. Girl 4 Age 9 history. Girl 5 Age 10 swimming. Girl 6 Age 9 horse riding.
As you can see the most popular hobby seems to be swimming and the second is horse riding,which only girls chose.
